title: Ep 421 | Jase's Number One Rule for Marriage & the 'Something Went Wrong' Story
description:
Jase shares a tip for a very happy marriage, and Phil talks about bad acorn crops and the diet of wood ducks. Jase talks about the challenges of hunting and how they appeal to his competitive nature. Al discusses sexuality within marriage and the parable of a servant who owed a debt of forgiveness. And Jase's TV error prompts him to create an analogy for Missy.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
